Author: MajorArcanine
Text: A Lot of my dysmorphoa is face focused. It's like I wake up with a new face some mornings and it really gets me down... honestly I just try not to look at my reflection yoo much on those days and just remind myself that other people do not see what I see.

Author: iron_blanket
Text: Yes. I sometimes go through periods were I'm disgusted by the flesh on my face. It's hard to explain but it feels like  I'm literally wearing a mask and it's not meant to be there.   I try to do things to make my skin feel better, like face masks and steam baths, and cleansing juices but usually I just have to let it pass.
